problem.p: The speed option allows you to speed up or slow down the video.
Which of the following is not one of the speed options you can choose from?

choicegroup.label: Which of the following is *not* one of the speed options you can choose from?

div.p: The speed option does not provide a speed option of 2 and a half times faster than the normal speed. It does, however, often provide a speed option of 2 times faster than the normal speed, which is not visible in the video.
